data.title: Weather in Deylam, Bushehr Province, Iran
data.meta_description: The most accurate current weather forecast in Deylam. Be prepared for today's weather with a detailed local report.
data.text:
Weather details for Deylam, on Monday, August 12th:

The maximum temperature of the day is going to be 45°C at about 2 pm. The day will have comfortable humidity, with average humidity of 46%, ranging from 19% to a maximum value of 77% at about 2 am. The wind will be breezy, and will get up to 19 km/h at 3 pm, blowing from the west. The cloud coverage will range from 0% around 8 am to as high as 84% around midnight with an average of 14%.

There is no probability for any precipitation throughout the day. The dew point will range from 16°C up to a maximum value of 27°C around 2 am.

The visibility is expected to be good with average visibility of 16 km throughout the day. Atmospheric pressure will be extremely low with average pressure of 997 hPa. Sunrise will be at 5:36 am, and sunset at 6:50 pm. The day will have 13 hours and 14 minutes of daylight.

Air quality forecast for Deylam, on Monday, August 12th:

On average, the air quality on this day will be unhealthy for sensitive groups, meaning that members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is less likely to be affected. According to our index, ranging from 0 to 500, the air quality is going to be between values of 145 and 151.

Pollen forecast for Deylam, on Monday, August 12th:

The overall pollen forecast for this day shows no significant pollen. Tree pollen on this day is expected to have no risk. There's no risk of weed pollen, and as for grass pollen, this day is expected to have no risk.

Weather information for Deylam, on Tuesday, August 13th:

The maximum temperature during the day will be 48°C around 2 pm. The day will be very dry, with average humidity of 28%, ranging from 9% to a maximum value of 50% at about midnight. The wind will be breezy, and will get up to 25 km/h at 3 pm, blowing from the west. The sky will be clear of clouds along the day.

There is no probability for any precipitation throughout the day. The dew point will range from 8°C up to a maximum value of 22°C around midnight.

The visibility is expected to be good with average visibility of 16 km throughout the day. Atmospheric pressure will be extremely low with average pressure of 998 hPa. Sunrise will be at 5:37 am, and sunset at 6:49 pm, making it a total of 13 hours and 12 minutes of daylight.

Air quality forecast for Deylam, on Tuesday, August 13th:

On average, the air quality on this day will be unhealthy for sensitive groups, meaning that members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is less likely to be affected. According to our index, ranging from 0 to 500, the air quality is going to be between values of 122 and 150.

Pollen forecast for Deylam, on Tuesday, August 13th:

The overall pollen forecast for this day shows no significant pollen. Tree pollen on this day is expected to have no risk. There's no risk of weed pollen, and as for grass pollen, this day is expected to have no risk.
